page.title: 14COMMUNICATION
page.content: THE TELEPHONE IS USEFUL BUT SOME-TIMES IT IS TAKEN FOR GRANTED. IF PEOPLE NEED TO CONTACT SOMBODY WHO LIVES QUITE NEAR, THEY PICK UP THE PHONE INSTEAD OF WALKING TO THEIR HOUSE. THE RESULT IS A HIGH TELEPHONE BILL. THERE SHOULD BE MORE PUBLIC PHONE BOXES FOR PEOPLE WHO DO NOT KNOW THE AREA. THE C.B. IS GOOD FOR FARMS BECAUSE IN THIS AREA OF LARGE FARMS AND ESTATES THE C.B. IS A IDEAL MEANS OF COMMUNICATION. THE POST IS FAIRLY RELIABLE, YOU CAN POST A LETTER TO ANY WHERE IN THE WORLD. FIRST CLASS IS ESPECIALLY GOOD BECAUSE YOUR LETTER GETS TO THE RECIPIENT WITHIN 24 HOURS.
